processors.name: Update Line Record with HDR ID

properties.SQL:
SELECT 
e.LINES_ID l_dtl_id, 
o.pk_composite_key_lines, o.pk_composite_key, o.hdr_id, o.l_line_number, 
o.l_line_type, o.l_applied_to_trx_id, o.l_applied_to_trx_num, o.l_entitas_edb, 
o.l_entitas_ebs, o.l_cabang_edb, o.l_cabang_ebs, o.l_cost_center_edb, 
o.l_cost_center_ebs, o.l_nat_account_efin_edb, o.l_nat_account_efin_ebs, 
o.l_bank_invest_edb, o.l_bank_invest_ebs, o.l_lob_produk_edb, o.l_lob_produk_ebs, 
o.l_channel_edb, o.l_channel_ebs, o.l_program_kerja_edb, o.l_program_kerja_ebs, 
o.l_intercompany_edb, COALESCE(o.l_intercompany_ebs, '') l_intercompany_ebs, o.l_future1_edb, o.l_future1_ebs, 
o.l_future2_edb, o.l_future2_ebs, o.l_future3_edb, o.l_future3_ebs, o.l_amount, 
o.l_base_amount, o.l_line_description, o.l_no_kontrak, o.l_no_polis, 
o.l_produk, o.l_no_claim, o.l_jenis_klaim_invest, o.l_nama_bank, o.l_jenis_klaim, 
o.l_interco, o.l_jns_trans_reasuransi, o.l_sektor_usaha, o.l_sektor_mitra, o.l_wilayah, 
o.l_kode_rayon, o.l_wni, o.l_attribute24, o.l_attribute25, o.l_attribute26, 
o.l_attribute27, o.l_attribute28, o.l_attribute29, o.l_attribute30, o.l_created_by, 
o.l_creation_date, o.l_last_updated_by, o.l_last_update_date, o.l_etl_date, 
o.l_process_flag, o.err_message_1, o.err_message_2, o.err_message_3, o.err_message_4, 
o.err_message_5, o.err_message_6, o.err_message_7, o.err_message_8, o.err_message_9, 
o.err_message_10, o.err_message_11, o.err_message_12, o.xla_status, o.created_date, 
o.last_upd_date, trim(COALESCE(o.err_message_1, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_2, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_3, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_4, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_5, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_6, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_7, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_8, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_9, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_10, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_11, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_12, '')) err_message, o.event_id, o.h_ledger_id, o.h_ledger_name
FROM original o 
JOIN enrichment e 
ON o.pk_composite_key_lines = e.LINE_COMPOSITE_KEY

SELECT 
e.PK_COMPOSITE_KEY pk_composite_key, e.HDR_ID hdr_id, o.h_legal_entity_id, o.h_ledger_id, 
o.h_application_id, o.h_request_id, o.h_application_name, o.h_application_name_ebs,
o.h_event_model_code, o.h_event_model_name, o.h_event_model_name_ebs, o.h_event_class_code,
o.h_event_class_name, o.h_event_type_code, o.h_event_type_name, o.h_trx_id, o.h_trx_num,
o.h_trx_source_description, o.h_trx_date, o.h_gl_date, o.h_trx_ref_id, o.h_currency_code,
o.h_exchange_rate_type, o.h_exchange_date, o.h_exchange_rate, o.h_biaya_adm, o.h_lebih_bayar, 
o.h_no_kontrak, o.h_no_polis, o.h_produk, o.h_no_claim, o.h_bukti_pembayaran, o.h_bukti_penerimaan, 
o.h_jenisnya, o.h_bayar_tenor, o.h_cara_bayar, o.h_migrasi, o.h_jenis_klaim, o.h_nama_peserta, 
o.h_no_desisi, o.h_no_mutasi, o.h_created_by, o.h_creation_date, o.h_last_updated_by, o.h_last_update_date,
o.h_process_flag, o.err_message_1, o.err_message_2, o.err_message_3, o.err_message_4, o.err_message_5,
o.err_message_6, o.err_message_7, o.err_message_8, o.err_message_9, o.err_message_10, o.err_message_11,
o.err_message_12, o.xla_status, o.h_ledger_name, trim(COALESCE(o.err_message_1, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_2, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_3, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_4, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_5, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_6, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_7, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_8, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_9, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_10, '') || COALESCE(o.err_message_11, '') || 
COALESCE(o.err_message_12, '')) err_message
FROM original o
JOIN enrichment e
ON o.pk_composite_key = e.PK_COMPOSITE_KEY

properties.SQL select query: SELECT '${kafka.key:replace('"', '')}' AS pk_composite_key, XXCUST_FAH_IFG_HDR_S.NEXTVAL as hdr_id FROM DUAL

properties.proper: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE err_message is not null and err_message <> ''

properties.exist: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE hdr_id is not null
properties.new: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE hdr_id is null

properties.SQL select query: SELECT '${kafka.key:replace('"', ''):append(${l_line_number})}' AS line_composite_key, XXCUST_FAH_IFG_LNS_S.NEXTVAL as lines_id FROM DUAL

destination.name: Update Line Record with HDR ID

source.name: Update Line Record with HDR ID
